column4: what process during the booting of a liveCD do you think would cause my laptop screen to do a weird black to white fade and the machine become locked solid?  it happens on any version (64/32, live/alternate, safe/normal graphics mode)  it's a new hp tx 1000 (turon 64 x2 / 2gb)
brady what are you trying to install?
am guessing its when it uses vga mode
